spell_tooltip.description:
Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.
Disarm the enemy's weapons and shield for 5 sec. Disarmed creatures deal significantly reduced damage.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by 3% for 6 sec. Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional 3%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 69,333 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 27,250 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 33,169 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.
Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 139,234 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 23,148 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam and Whirlwind deal 20% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 6% and Leech increased by 4%.
Haste increased by 2% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 20% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 290,700 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 351,086 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Shield Wall grants 4 sec of the other.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 785,099 damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 2.8 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 75,411 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.
Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 51,139 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Revenge deals 10% more damage, or 20% more damage when your successful dodges or parries have made it cost no Rage.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 45,068 Physical damage instantly and an additional 147,501 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Taunts all enemies within 14 yds to attack you for 6 sec, interrupts all spellcasting within 14 yds and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 6 sec.
Revenge damage increased by 10% and Revenge increases the damage of your next Thunder Clap by 20%.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 12% and your Block value by 24%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 491,779 Physical damage to it and 154,758 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Unleash a series of precise and powerful strikes against your target, dealing 1.8 million damage to it, and 1.1 million damage to enemies within 8 yds of it. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

While channeling Demolish, you take 10% less damage and are immune to stuns, knockbacks, and forced movement effects.

You can block, parry, dodge, and use certain defensive abilities while channeling Demolish.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by 7% per stack.
Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by 20%.
Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by 10%.
Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

Run at high speed at a distance in front of you. All enemies in your path will take 79,879 Physical damage and be knocked back.
Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 12 times.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 68,669 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 27,257 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 33,359 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee.
Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 140,333 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 23,299 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Hurl your weapon at the enemy,  removing any magical immunities and causing 701,914 Physical damage, ignoring armor. Deals up to 500% increased damage to absorb shields.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 20%.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.

Throw a spear at the target location, dealing 273,682 Physical damage instantly and an additional 457,143 damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

The duration of Champion's Spear is increased by 2 sec. You deal 25% increased critical strike damage to targets chained to your Spear.
